nikuth karala dina kihipayak wunath, me dawaswala prekshakayan wadipurama narambaapu thema githaya widihata ‘wes’ thema githaya idiriyata awith thibenawa.

kese wethath eya siduwiya yuththe 19 wani wyawastha sanshodhanaye haraya aaraksha karamin bawath ema niwedanaye dakweyi.
